sentences.english: Wisdom and Valor, My Compliments, Promise.
sentences.chinese: 望，智慧与勇猛，我的问候，许诺。

sentences.english: When David heard of it, he sent Joab and all the army of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: We're just sorta assessing where to go with the band.
sentences.chinese: 我们只是勇猛的评估与乐队到哪儿去。

sentences.english: Stick dancing should be bold, powerful, quick and forceful.
John is a real Rambo in the basketball court.
sentences.chinese: 约翰在篮球场上像蓝波一样勇猛。

sentences.english: He is full of valour and vigour , but he also has  depression.
sentences.chinese: 他勇猛而有活力，但他同样也有失落的时候。

sentences.english: The true contempt of an invader is shown by deeds of valour in the field-hermocrates of syracuse.
sentences.chinese: 侵略者真正的蔑视表现在战场上勇猛的行为。

sentences.english: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
sentences.chinese: 大卫听见了，就差派约押统带勇猛的全军出去。

sentences.english: Does it not take fierce determination for an athlete to win a medal in the Olympics?
sentences.chinese: 要在奥运会上赢得奖牌，运动员不需要勇猛的决心吗？

sentences.english: Even the bravest of your forebears kept his Kingsguard close about him in times of peril.
sentences.chinese: 就算你祖先里最勇猛的人也知道危险的时候不离铁卫。

sentences.english: When hungry it goes after its prey with fierce determination.
sentences.chinese: 饥饿时，它会以勇猛的决心去追捕猎物。

sentences.english: Hu had very few, brave as the king of beast.
sentences.chinese: 虎本来就很稀少，勇猛为兽中之王。

sentences.english: Fearlessly, Tom lashed into the robbers, who soon ran away.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆勇猛无畏地痛打抢劫犯，很快就把他们打跑了。

sentences.english: Your father knew the dangers of being over-bold.
sentences.chinese: 你的父亲知道龙过于勇猛的下场。

sentences.english: He fearlessly lammed into his attackers, and soon they all fled away.
sentences.chinese: 他勇猛无畏地痛打袭击者，很快他们都逃跑了。

definition: to be brave and good at fighting (idiom)
fierce general/valiant military leader/fig. brave individual
